desc: The Prairie Mercantile is a home decor & lifestyle store. Featuring the tried, tested, and true products that we can't life without. The Prairie Mercantile is an exclusive Canadian distributor for Rock & Ruddle Hairbrushes. Shop our Baker's shop, self-care collection, Kid's collection & farmhouse style decor.

layout.text: The Prairie Mercantile is the exclusive distributor for Rock & Ruddle products in Canada. Your hair will never be healthier, shinier or happier.
